summary:
**Toy Story 3** is a 2010 animated movie from Pixar. In the story, Andy, now a teenager, is going to college. His mom accidentally donates his toys to a daycare center. Woody, Buzz, and the other toys must decide where their loyalties lie.

The movie was made after Disney bought Pixar and had a big budget of $200 million. It was a big hit, making over $1 billion worldwide. It won many awards, including an Oscar for Best Animated Feature. A sequel, **Toy Story 4**, came out in 2019.
title: Toy Story 3
